snippet.title: Killed Until Dead (Apple II - Accolade)
snippet.description:
Killed Until Dead (http://www.mobygames.com/game/apple2/killed-until-dead) was a detective game published by Accolade in 1987 for the Apple ][. The player needs to collect enough evidence to stop the murderer from carrying out his/her act.

Credits:
Cover art - www.mocagh.org
